channel.title: Network Notes
channel.description: Reflections of an IT Infrastructure Consultant learning about automation, security, and routing/switching

item.title: Let's Encrypt certificates for VMware Horizon
item.author: billyzoellers
item.description: SSL certificate renewal using LetsEncrypt for VMware View VDI

item.title: Let's upgrade Cisco SD-WAN
item.author: billyzoellers
item.description: Follow along with me as I upgrade our SD-WAN fabric from 20.3.5 to 20.6.3. Cisco SD-WAN upgrades are relatively painless, and easy to accomplish without downtime.

item.title: Catalyst on Meraki: Getting Started
item.author: billyzoellers
item.description: Cisco Live 2022 represents the birth of "Catalyst on Meraki". Get started monitoring Catalyst 9500, 9300, and 9200 switches in Meraki Dashboard with just a few clicks!

item.title: Meraki automation using Typer
item.author: billyzoellers
item.description: Typer is a library for building CLI applications. It boasts a simple syntax, features to minimize code duplication, and options to provide auto-completion and help for end users. It's great for creating automation tools while not sweating all the complexity of building a good CLI tool.

item.title: Automating Cisco CallManager
item.author: billyzoellers
item.description: A simple find and replace tool for calledPartyTransformationMasks in Cisco CallManager using Python. The ciscoaxl and rich libraries make it simple to interface with CallManager and create beautiful CLI output.

item.title: What are Cards on Webex Teams?
item.author: billyzoellers
item.description: Find out about the various options for formatting messages on Webex Teams. Plain text, markdown, and now buttons & cards.
